name: Urcrowd
overview:
Urcrowd allows users to create and share images, memes and videos with others.

Urcrowd has developed a proprietary editing tool, canvas, that allows users to easily edit images or create memes and immediately share with others. It also allows them to re-edit or tweak other people’s images to create a unique form of the image thus adding a novel ‘twist’ to it. Users can also follow others and create their own personal group of friends which they can interact with. Additionally they can up vote or down vote other people’s creations and also comment, like or share to various other networks such as Facebook and Twitter.
